member.name: M:SharedCode.Windows.WPF.BindableBase.SetProperty``1(``0@,``0,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a property already matches a desired value. Sets the property and notifies listeners only when necessary.
member.param: A reference to a property with both getter and setter.
The desired value for the property.
The name of the property used to notify listeners. This value is optional and can be provided automatically when invoked from compilers that support CallerMemberName.
member.returns: True if the value was changed, false if the existing value matched the desired value.

member.name: M:SharedCode.Windows.WPF.BindableBase.SetProperty``1(``0@,``0,System.Action,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a property already matches a desired value. Sets the property and notifies listeners only when necessary.
member.param: A reference to a property with both getter and setter.
The desired value for the property.
The name of the property used to notify listeners. This value is optional and can be provided automatically when invoked from compilers that support CallerMemberName.
The action that is called after the property value has been changed.
member.returns: True if the value was changed, false if the existing value matched the desired value.

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SharedCode.Windows.WPF.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SharedCode.Windows.WPF.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
